title: Sri Lanka demands to know if ITAK is pretending to seek a Federal solution but aiming for a Confederacy
content: The ITAK has a new leader. He is Mavai Senathirajah. It is a perfect time to bring questions out into the open and seek answers to satisfy our doubts.
